summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2695, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Bay View Street to Hanford Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of wood curbs and gutters, by planking the east side of the street and relaying the existing wood walks on the west side of the street and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 31665 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
